properties.description: Description Custom Manual - MCSB Baseline item LT-4 for Storage
properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item LT-4 for Storage

features.featureDescription: Service produces resource logs that can provide enhanced service-specific metrics and logging. The customer can configure these resource logs and send them to their own data sink like a storage account or log analytics workspace.
features.featureGuidance: Ingest logs via Azure Monitor to aggregate security data generated by endpoints devices, network resources, and other security systems. Within Azure Monitor, use Log Analytics Workspace(s) to query and perform analytics, and use Azure Storage Accounts for long-term/archival storage, optionally with security features such as immutable storage and enforced retention holds.
features.customerActionsDescription: Enable network logging for security investigation
